about_the_game:
In a world where lines between justice and chaos are constantly shifting, you take on the role of a sniper contractor—a lone wolf operating on the edge of morality. Known only by the call sign Phantom, you are a shadow in the wilderness, your marksmanship silent but lethal.

"Sniper: Phantom's Resolution" is a first-person tactical shooter that focuses on stealth, precision, and difficult moral decisions. As a veteran sniper with a heavy conscience, your skills and experience are the only tools you have to navigate a world where each mission could be your last. Each contract you take is not just a job, but a moral crossroads. What you decide could change the fate of the world—and your own.

Operating in remote, hostile environments, from dense forests to barren deserts and war-torn landscapes, you'll face high-stakes operations that challenge your skills and your judgment. Precision and patience are key to survival, but your moral choices will ultimately define who you are.

Every mission offers multiple outcomes. You might be tasked with eliminating high-profile targets, gathering intelligence, or securing sensitive locations. Yet, the true challenge lies not in your shooting skills, but in the tough decisions you make along the way. Will you uphold the values you swore to protect? Or will you embrace a darker path?

As Phantom, you must balance the act of silent execution with the weight of your decisions. In a game where your choices echo beyond the trigger pull, there is no easy way out—only resolution.

This is more than a sniper's duty. It's a journey to settle debts, confront the past, and face the consequences of every action.

Key Features:

  • First-Person Sniper Mechanics – Immersive shooting system that takes into account distance, wind, elevation, and other factors to deliver the most realistic sniper experience.

  • Moral Decision-Making – Every mission has multiple possible outcomes. The decisions you make will affect the story and determine your path.

  • Remote, Realistic Environments – Operate in a variety of challenging, expansive environments—dense forests, arid deserts, and war-torn areas—each with their own unique set of tactical challenges.

  • Stealth and Precision – Master the art of staying hidden, waiting for the perfect shot, and executing your mission with flawless precision.

  • Dynamic Storyline – Your choices shape the outcome. Each mission has its own consequences, and the path you take will determine the fate of the world... and yourself.

content_descriptors.notes:
Our game contains content designed for mature audiences. This includes:

Violence: Realistic depictions of sniper action, including blood, intense combat sequences, and the use of lethal force.
Strong Themes: The storyline may include morally complex scenarios, including themes of justice, revenge, and the consequences of violence.
Language: Occasional use of strong language appropriate to the narrative and characters.
While our game strives for realism and immersive storytelling, all adult content is intended to enhance the depth and authenticity of the experience. Players should be prepared for mature themes and intense moments.

If you have specific concerns about the content, please feel free to reach out for more detailed information.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10 x64 / Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600k 3.5 GHz /AMD Ryzen 3 1300X 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB / Intel Arc A750
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 / Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 3.6 GHz /AMD Ryzen 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070 Ti / Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 / AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
